description: Track basic metrics for running services on AWS

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE "url" =~ /^$PingURL$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE "url" =~ /^$PingURL$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE "url" =~ /^$PingURL$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT max("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE "url" = '208.67.222.222' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ping" WITH KEY = "url"
list.name: PingURL
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ping" WITH KEY = "url"

title: Data monitoring dashboard
